title: Simple Dimmer by Deako, Slide Switch, 3-Way/4-Way/Single Pole, Neutral Wire Required, White

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #34,422 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #79 in Dimmer Switches       #79 in Dimmer Switches

product_category: Tools & Home Improvement‚Ä∫Electrical‚Ä∫Switches & Dimmers‚Ä∫Wall Switches‚Ä∫Dimmer Switches
feature_bullets: SIMPLE SLIDER: Use the smooth sliding dimmer to create the right mood with your lights.
ROCKER SWITCH: Easily turn the lights on or off with the rocker switch.
PERFECT LIGHT LEVELS: Don‚Äôt worry about things getting too dark. You can adjust the minimum dimness with the trim wheel tucked under the rocker switch.
IDEAL LOCATIONS: The Simple Dimmer works best in cozy spaces. Put it in your bathroom, office, or nursery.
EASY INSTALLATION: Save on electrician costs‚Äîyou can install the Simple Dimmer in seconds. Even without turning off the power, the Deako system protects you from electrocution.

COMPATIBILITY: The Simple Dimmer works with dimmable bulbs, including 600W incandescent/halogen and 150W LED/ELV/MLV loads. It works best where one switch controls the lights (single pole circuits), but it can be used where multiple switches control the lights (multiway circuits) if all the other switches are Deako Simple Rocker Switches. The Deako Backplate where you set the Simple Dimmer up needs a neutral wire connection.

customers_say: Customers find the dimmer switch easy to install and appreciate that it requires no wiring, eliminating the need for an electrician. The functionality is positive, with one customer noting it works well in new construction homes. The dimming ability receives mixed feedback - while customers can adjust brightness, some report it doesn't dim all the way down. Moreover, the switchability and flickering lights aspects also get mixed reviews, with some customers reporting their lights flicker constantly. The value for money receives mixed opinions, with several customers finding it expensive.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Many homes in our area are being built with this type of electrical system. This switch, dimmers and outlets are the simplest to replace. It is literally plug and play. No locating and opening the breaker, no wiring to mess with. All is needed is to remove the faceplate, unclip the switch, pop it out, then replace with replacement. I replaced a light switch with a dimmer switch in less than a minute. Downside is, they're a little more expensive than the standard switches, are not available at your local hardware store yet and are not compatible with standard switches.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: The Deako Lighting Simple Dimmer brings sleek, modern convenience to your home lighting system. Whether you‚Äôre looking to adjust the ambiance in your living room or fine-tune the lighting in your bedroom, this dimmer switch offers smooth, easy control. It‚Äôs perfect for anyone looking for an upgrade from the basic on/off switch to something that lets you set the mood just right.Pros:1. Sleek & Modern Design: The clean white finish and simple slide switch blend seamlessly into any room d√©cor, adding a touch of sophistication.2. Easy to Install: With a neutral wire required, the installation process is straightforward and well-suited for anyone with basic wiring knowledge.3. Versatile Compatibility: Whether you‚Äôre working with a 3-way, 4-way, or single-pole setup, this dimmer works across multiple configurations, making it ideal for a variety of uses around your home.4. Smooth Operation: The dimming action is smooth and responsive, giving you full control over your lighting without any sudden jumps or flickers.5. Enhanced Control: Adjusting the lighting to the perfect level has never been easier. Ideal for setting the right mood for dinner parties, movie nights, or winding down after a long day.Cons:1. Neutral Wire Required: The neutral wire requirement may complicate installation for some homes, especially if you‚Äôre working with older electrical systems that don‚Äôt have this wiring.2. No Smart Features: While it provides excellent manual control, it doesn‚Äôt offer smart connectivity, so you won‚Äôt be able to control it from your phone or integrate it with home automation systems.3. Limited Color Options: It only comes in white, which may not be ideal if you‚Äôre looking for a specific color or style to match your existing switches.For anyone looking to add a bit more flexibility to their lighting setup, the Deako Lighting Simple Dimmer delivers in both design and function. It‚Äôs a great choice if you‚Äôre looking to adjust the brightness with ease while maintaining a modern look in your home!
